name: Pixel Pond
description:
Pixel Pond is a top down shooter where you move in the opposite direction of where you shoot by firing a pressured jet stream of pond, use that stream to move and hunt.

Chunks of meat represent points, and make sure to avoid the ponds inhabitants if your smaller, your a tiny frog in a big dangerous world.

Bubbles, Occasionally drop meat, and don't even think about damaging the gator. 

Controls:

space - gain water

left click - squirt water

up & down arrows - menu navigation

enter - menu selection
